Time Remaining:

📝 Quiz Guidelines:

  • Read each question carefully before selecting an answer.
  • Choose the most appropriate option (no wild guesses! 🤔).
  • Review your answers before submitting to maximize success.

⏰Time Management:

  • Manage your time wisely (no time-turners allowed! ⌛).
  • Keep an eye on the clock and progress through the questions.
  • Remember, every second counts! ⏳

🎓Academic Integrity:

  • Attempt the quiz independently (no cheating, please! 🙅‍♂️).
  • Do not seek external help or consult unauthorized materials.
  • Let your brilliance shine through honestly! ✨

📤Submission:

  • Click on the "Start" button when you're ready to begin.
  • Don't refresh the page or navigate away during the quiz (no escape routes! 🏃‍♀️).
  • Submit your quiz before the deadline or time runs out.

Quiz Completed!
